subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: There certainly won’t be a men’s final like the classic Federer-Nadal battle last year, but it will still be a Wimbledon like no other, with a host of challengers and a new roof.
snippet: There certainly won’t be a men’s final like the classic Federer-Nadal battle last year, but it will still be a Wimbledon like no other, with a host of challengers and a new roof.
